creatives.headline: Uncover the Truth: Cambodia's Forgotten Genocide
creatives.description: Learn about the horrific actions of Pol Pot and the Khmer Rouge during their four-year reign in Cambodia. Witness the atrocities committed against innocent civilians and the devastating effects it had on the country. Take a stand against genocide and support efforts to bring justice for the victims.
creatives.call_to_action: Join us in spreading awareness about this forgotten tragedy and fighting against the horrors of genocide. Donate now to support organizations working towards justice and accountability.
video_snippets: Cambodia's Killing Fields: The Forgotten Genocide

suggestions: Shorter CTAs typically drive better conversion rates
